contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. Commonwealth v. Jette, 23 A.3d 1032 (Pa.2011); Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permissible). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
